channel.title: Solpi Yacht Club
channel.description: Recent content on Solpi Yacht Club

item.title: About
item.description: Solpi Yacht Club (SYC) is a welcoming community of yachting enthusiasts located in Seoul, South Korea. Our club was established in 2021 with the goal of bringing together sailors of all levels to enjoy the beauty of the Korean coast and oceans. At SYC, we are passionate about sailing and we strive to provide a friendly and inclusive environment for all members. Whether you’re an experienced sailor or just starting out, we welcome you to join us in our adventures.

item.title: Membership
item.description: Thank you for your interest in joining Solpi Yacht Club. New Members are always welcome. We offer three of membership types: regular, youth, or overseas member. Take a look and see which one is right for you! Regular membership This is the first item's accordion body. It is shown by default, until the collapse plugin adds the appropriate classes that we use to style each element. These classes control the overall appearance, as well as the showing and hiding via CSS transitions.

item.title: Namhean 2022
item.description: Prep Day! We didn’t really sail but we launched the boat in the morning and docked the boat in the Ungchun harbor. In the afternoon, we did a quick practice session for tacking and downwind sailing. We were still short one person for the race the next day, so we didn’t put up the spinnaker yet. We came in around sunset, cleaned the boat, and headed out for some delicious duck dinner.
